Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Afk
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
[Group("afk", "Set or Manage AFK")]
public class SlashAfk : MewdekoSlashModuleBase<AfkService>, IInteractionModuleBase

InteractiveService serv

DiscordSocketClient client

The discord client.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Afk(string?)

Sets the user's AFK status with an optional message.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("set", "Set your afk with an optional message", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.SendMessages)]
public Task Afk(string? message = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string message

The AFK message. If not provided, the user's AFK status will be toggled.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

.afk

.afk I'm AFK

| Edit this page View Source

AfkDisable(ITextChannel)

Sets the channel where the AFK message will not display.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("disable", "Disables afk messages to be shown in channels you specify.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageChannels)]
public Task AfkDisable(ITextChannel channel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel channel

Channel you want to add to the afk message blacklist.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

/afk disable #channel

Removes the AFK status for a user.

Declaration

Type Name Description

The user you want to remove afk from.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

/afk remove @user

| Edit this page View Source

AfkTimeout(string)

Sets the timeout duration before a user is no longer considered afk. Triggers when a user sends a message or types in a channel.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("timeout", "Sets after how long mewdeko no longer ignores a user's typing/messages.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AfkTimeout(string input)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string input

The timeout duration for the AFK status.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

/afk timeout 1h

| Edit this page View Source

AfkType(AfkTypeEnum)

Sets the type of AFK behavior for the guild.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("type", "Sets how afk messages are removed. Do @Mewdeko help afktype to see more.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task AfkType(Afk.AfkTypeEnum afkTypeEnum)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Afk.AfkTypeEnum afkTypeEnum

The type of AFK behavior to set. AfkTypeEnum
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

.afktype 1

Declaration

[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageChannels)]
public Task AfkUndisable(ITextChannel channel)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ITextChannel channel

The text channel for which to remove from the afk message blacklist.

Examples

/afk undisable #channel

Examples

| Edit this page View Source

CustomAfkMessage(string)

Sets a custom AFK embed that will be displayed when a user is AFK. Use "-" to reset to the default embed. Check https://eb.mewdeko.tech for the embed builder and http://mewdeko.tech/placeholders for placeholders.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("message", "Allows you to set a custom embed for AFK messages.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task CustomAfkMessage(string embedCode)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string embedCode

The custom message to set. Use "-" to reset to the default message.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

/afk message -

/afk message embedcode

public Task GetActiveAfks()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

./afk listactive

TimedAfk(string, string)

Sets a timed AFK status with a custom message.

Declaration
[SlashCommand("timed", "Sets a timed afk that auto removes itself and pings you when it.", false, RunMode.Default)]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[SlashUserPerm(GuildPermission.SendMessages)]
public Task TimedAfk(string time, string message)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string time

The duration for the AFK status.
string message

The custom message for the AFK status.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

.afk 1h I'm AFK
